Package net.ontopia.infoset.fulltext.utils

A collection of fulltext index utilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractLocatorDocumentProcessor INTERNAL: An abstract document processor class that can be subclassed by classes that needs to process locator information stored in documents.
DefaultIndexerManager INTERNAL: A standalone index manager that performs document processing and indexing processes in the current thread.
DocumentPreloaderProcessor INTERNAL: A document processor that preloads an external document referenced by one of the documents fields.
Locator2ContentProcessor INTERNAL: A document processor that replaces notation and address fields with a reader field.
ThreadedIndexerManager INTERNAL: A standalone index manager that uses threads and in-memory queues to manage document processing and indexing processes.
 

Package net.ontopia.infoset.fulltext.utils Description

A collection of fulltext index utilities.
